definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be easy (Ar. ha0na be light, easy, cf. hawnun, haynun (v. [[אוּן]]), Aram. NH [[הוֹן]] gentleness, hwn, hawno0 is mind, sense; vid. conject. on development of mngs. Fl Ch WB: i. 423)—only

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf [[וַתָּהִינוּ]] sq. Inf. De 1:41 regard as easy  to go up, or make light  of going up; so Thes Kn Ke Di RVm (construct. as Nu 14:44 [[וַיַּעְפִּלוּ לַעֲלוֹת]], though ‖ to this in Dt is v:De 1:43).
